ygData.subject: Re: Najah bites at Lady hawk
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawks busy holding off Najahs bite yo worry about freezing. Zardus, I will gladly freeze if you get this thing off me. She swipes a talon at Najah,

Lady Hawks busy holding off Najahs bite yo worry about freezing. "Zardus, I
will gladly freeze if you get this thing off me." She swipes a talon at
Najah, trying to keep the snakes head away.

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 06, 2000 5:53 AM
Subject: Re: Najah bites at Lady hawk


> ::Zardus/Repressor/Havoc::
>
> Zardus, Repressor, and Havoc land around Lady Hawk, their weapons
> aimed at her. Havoc bends down and picks up Squizzy.
>
> "Both of you, freeze," Zardus says, watching Lady Hawk with narrowed
> eyes.
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Squizzy::was struck and felt the needle plune into her. She fell
> forward
> > and landed on her hands and knees. She turned her head, looking at
> > LadyHawk, "Why? I thought you were a friend?"
> >
> > Lady Hawk looked down at Squizzy, "I am a friend,  but I can't risk
> my
> > science being turned into a weapon. She lowered herself to finish
> the
> > mongoose but hesitated.
> >
> > Squizzy, felt sick to her stomach and light headed. She couldn't
> understand,
> > why was this bot
> > of science attacking her. "I wanted to see the nature bots too."
> She fell
> > down and layed on her side. She felt disoriented and fearful.
> >
> > Lady Hawk saw her error at the next moment. she couldn't let Zardus
> have the
> > experiments, and she couldn't allow Squizzy to stay here either.
> she tried
> > to pick her up when Najah attacked.Lady Hawk wasn't trained as a
> warrior,
> > she was to wrapped up with Squizzy that she didn't see Najah until
> she was
> > wrapped up in Najahs coils. Lady Hawk managed to get her talons up
> in time
> > to block Najahs bite. Useing all her strength she held on for dear
> life,
> > trying to break the snakes hold on her. "Snakes were supposed to be
> eaten by
> > hawks, not the other way around." she thought as the snakes bite
> came
> > closer. She looked back towards Squizzy, she hoped the mongoose
> could handle
> > the snake for her unfortunately Najah had other ideas. One of those
> ideas
> > seemed to involve a Hawk dinner.
> >
> > Najah started crush Lady HAwk's body as if he were a phyton. Lady
> Hawk was
> > beginning to feal like a recycled can. "Would you stop already?
> we're
> > supposed to be on the same side." Somehow she knew that Najah
> probably
> > didn't care about sides. She tried to squirm with no effect. her
> only hope
> > was that someone on the alliance would pull the snake off. Najah
> tried again
> > to bite her knowing that his mortal poyson would  do all work. The
> half Hawk
> > snapped forward trying to bite the snake. This creature needed to
> learn not
> > to mess with royalty.
>
>
>
>
>
